meanings.sent1: The toy I bought was overcheap, it broke after one day.
meanings.sent2: The overcheap shoes fell apart as soon as I wore them.
meanings.sent3: I tried to be overcheap with my gift, but it ended up being a disappointment.
meanings.sent4: The overcheap fabric tore easily, revealing its poor quality.
meanings.sent5: The overcheap car looked shiny but had many hidden problems.

meanings.definition: To sell at too low a price.
meanings.sent1: The store decided to overcheap the old stock to make space for new items.
meanings.sent2: He always overcheaps his products, making it hard for competitors to keep up.
meanings.sent3: The farmer accidentally overcheaped his crops, causing a rush of customers.
meanings.sent4: The company had to close down because they constantly overcheaped their services.
meanings.sent5: She overcheaped her artwork, not realizing its true value.

meanings.definition: To be too thrifty or stingy.
meanings.sent1: My friend tends to overcheap when it comes to buying gifts for others.
meanings.sent2: Don't overcheap on your own health, it's important to invest in good food.
meanings.sent3: He overcheaps on everything, even his own comfort.
meanings.sent4: She overcheaps on household items, never buying anything of quality.
meanings.sent5: The boss overcheaps on employee benefits, causing dissatisfaction among the staff.
